Uses of Class
org.fluidity.composition.ComponentContainer.BindingException

  • Packages that use ComponentContainer.BindingException 
    Package Description
    org.fluidity.composition
    Dependency injection container interface and supporting artifacts.
    org.fluidity.composition.container.spi
    Service provider interfaces to be implemented by the dependency injection container implementation.
    org.fluidity.composition.spi
    Service provider interfaces to handle special cases of software composition in Fluid Tools.

    • Uses of ComponentContainer.BindingException in org.fluidity.composition

      Methods in org.fluidity.composition that throw ComponentContainer.BindingException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> void ComponentContainer.Registry.bindComponent(Class<T> type, Class<? super T>... interfaces)
      If the given class is an interface, or if it represents a concrete class and its scope is set to any of its component interfaces, this method binds, in the container behind this registry, every component class whose scope is set to the given class, to their respective component interfaces.
      void ComponentContainer.Registry.bindFactory(ComponentFactory factory, Class<?>... interfaces)
      Binds a component factory instance to a list of component interfaces in the container behind this registry.
      <T> void ComponentContainer.Registry.bindInstance(T instance, Class<? super T>... interfaces)
      Binds a component instance to a list of component interfaces in the container behind this registry.
      static <T> Components.Interfaces Components.inspect(Class<T> componentClass, Class<? super T>... restrictions)
      Returns the list of component interfaces that should resolve to the given component class, and for each component interface a list of component group interfaces that the component is a member of through that component interface.
      <T> ComponentContainer.Registry ComponentContainer.Registry.isolateComponent(Class<T> type, Class<? super T>... interfaces)
      Binds a component class to a list of component interfaces behind this registry and allows, via the returned registry, the caller to add further bindings that will only be visible to the supplied component and each other.

    • Uses of ComponentContainer.BindingException in org.fluidity.composition.container.spi

      Methods in org.fluidity.composition.container.spi that throw ComponentContainer.BindingException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ComponentRegistry.bindComponent(Components.Interfaces interfaces)
      Binds a component class to a list of component interfaces and group interfaces.
      void ComponentRegistry.bindInstance(Object instance, Components.Interfaces interfaces)
      Binds a component instance to a list of component interfaces and group interfaces.
      MutableContainer ComponentRegistry.makeChildContainer(Components.Interfaces interfaces)
      Creates a child container and binds the given component while making its bindings also visible in the container behind this registry.

    • Uses of ComponentContainer.BindingException in org.fluidity.composition.spi

      Methods in org.fluidity.composition.spi that throw ComponentContainer.BindingException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> void ComponentFactory.Registry.bindComponent(Class<T> implementation, Class<? super T>... interfaces)
      Binds a component class to an optional list of component interfaces in the container behind this registry.
      <T> void ComponentFactory.Registry.bindInstance(T instance, Class<? super T>... interfaces)
      Binds a component instance to an optional list of component interfaces in the container behind this registry.
